alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:28PM EDT until May 11 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COOK...WESTERN BERRIEN AND NORTHEASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES... At 928 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lenox, or 7 miles northwest of Adel, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sparks, Lenox, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Cool Spring, Staunton, Barneyville, Laconte, Flat Ford and Wagon Wheel. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
